title: Generate pain-driven content ideas from market signals with GPT-4o, Xpoz MCP, Google Sheets, ClickUp, and Slack
description:
![image 6.png](fileId:3892)
## üìò Description
 This workflow automates market-driven content ideation by continuously discovering real user pain points from public discussions and converting them into execution-ready content ideas. It is designed for growth and content teams who want ideas grounded in actual customer language, frustrations, and unmet needs‚Äîrather than assumptions or generic brainstorming.
On a scheduled basis, the workflow scans public search and social platforms for conversations related to a defined niche and keyword set. An AI discovery agent extracts recurring pain points, common complaints, and the exact phrasing users use when describing their problems. These raw market signals are then transformed by a second AI agent into pain-driven content ideas, each mapped to a platform, format, hook, core pain point, resonance logic, and CTA.
All generated ideas are normalized, stored in a central Google Sheets content database, converted into execution tasks in ClickUp, and summarized in Slack for immediate team visibility. Built-in error handling ensures failures are reported instantly.
## ‚ö†Ô∏è Deployment Disclaimer
 This workflow is intended for self-hosted n8n instances only.
 It relies on MCP-based social intelligence tools and advanced AI agent orchestration not supported on n8n Cloud.
## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)
- ‚è∞ Scheduled Market Discovery Trigger
 Runs automatically on a defined schedule.
- üßæ Inject Niche and Keyword Parameters
 Defines the research scope for discovery.
- üîé Extract Raw User Pain Points (AI)
 Scans public discussions to capture real frustrations, questions, and language‚Äîno solutions, no opinions.
- üì° Public Search & Social Intelligence (MCP)
 Fetches relevant public conversations for analysis.
- üß† Generate Pain-Driven Content Ideas (AI)
 Converts raw pain points into platform-ready content ideas with hooks, formats, and CTAs.
- üßπ Normalize & Parse AI Output
 Cleans and standardizes content ideas for downstream systems.
- üìä Store Content Ideas in Google Sheets
 Appends ideas to a centralized content database.
- üóÇ Create Content Tasks in ClickUp
 Automatically creates execution-ready tasks for the content team.
- üì£ Aggregate & Summarize Ideas
 Generates a concise Slack summary highlighting volume, platforms, and strongest hooks.
- üö® Workflow Error Handler ‚Üí Email Alert
 Sends immediate error notifications if any step fails.
## üß© Prerequisites
 ‚Ä¢ Self-hosted n8n instance
 ‚Ä¢ OpenAI API credentials
 ‚Ä¢ MCP (Xpoz) public search & social intelligence credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Google Sheets API access
 ‚Ä¢ ClickUp API credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Slack API access
## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úî Content ideas grounded in real user pain
 ‚úî Eliminates manual research and brainstorming
 ‚úî Produces creator-ready, platform-specific ideas
 ‚úî Centralized storage and task creation
 ‚úî Clear Slack visibility for growth teams
 ‚úî Reliable error monitoring
## üë• Perfect For
 Content strategists
 Growth marketers
 B2B SaaS teams
 Automation and n8n-focused creators
 Marketing operations teams
